title: Pet Friendly, Views, Microwave
posting_body: At Benson Downs, every spacious one-, two- and three-bedroom floor plan has been thoughtfully designed to complement your personal style of living.
Our apartment features include private balconies / patios, cozy fireplaces, large living areas and full-size washers and dryers.
Our controlled access community is set amongst beautiful greenery and our amenities include after-hours courtesy patrol and a business center.
We are just a 10 minute drive to Boeing and 16 minutes to Seattle-Tacoma International Airport.
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
renton apartments, apartments for rent in renton wa, renton wa apartments, fairwood apartments renton, fairwood apartments renton wa
